original_text: Your eyes are like lamps and your body is like a room. Be careful that your eyes are like a clean lamp, then your whole body will have light. But if your eyes are dirty, your whole body will be completely in the dark.
korean_text: 네 몸의 등불은 눈이라 네 눈이 성하면 온 몸이 밝을 것이요 만일 나쁘면 네 몸도 어두우리라

sentences.original_text: and your body is like a room
that your eyes are like a clean lamp
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 눈이 깨끗한 등불과 같게 하십시오

sentences.original_text: then your whole body will have light
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신의 온 몸이 빛을 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But if your eyes are dirty
your whole body will be completely in the dark
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 온 몸이 완전히 어둠 속에 있을 것입니다
